About.name: Haotian Chen
About.self-introduction: Hi, I’m Haotian Chen from Chengdu, currently a Master’s student in ECE at Georgia Tech. I enjoy building frontend projects, learning AI and game dev. I like video games, making my own drinks, and planning trips in my free time

aiResume.title: AI Resume Generator
aiResume.description: A modern Next.js web app that generates resumes powered by GPT. Features real‑time preview and PDF export.
aiResume.details: Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Firebase Auth, and OpenAI API. Used react‑pdf to render export‑ready resumes.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A transparent, minimal, and animated portfolio website inspired by the Nothing Phone aesthetic.
portfolio.details: Built with Next.js App Router, Tailwind CSS V4, Framer Motion, and a CSS‑first glassmorphism system.

ghostHunter.title: Ghost Hunter
ghostHunter.description: An OpenGL‑powered FPS game where you vacuum up ghosts in a haunted house. Built with C++ and Visual Studio.
ghostHunter.details: Ghost Hunter is a simple FPS game developed using C++ and OpenGL. Use a vacuum cleaner to capture ghosts in a haunted house.

conceptDrift.title: Concept Drift in Audio Deepfake Detection
conceptDrift.description: An academic study on how evolving generative models affect audio deepfake‑detection generalization.
conceptDrift.details: Investigates how concept drift—changes in generative‑audio distributions—contributes to model overfitting and generalization failure.

subdomainSecurity.title: Subdomain Security in Japan
subdomainSecurity.description: A measurement study on TLS configurations and certificate mismatches in Japanese subdomains.
subdomainSecurity.details: Analyzes TLS configurations and certificate mismatches in 20 000+ Japanese websites, comparing top‑ranked and random domains.
